name: HEAVY Epic Apes Trippy Captain's Hat
description: The Bored Ape Yacht Club hit NFT Land by storm, quickly taking hold as the second highest grossing PFP project (at time of this mint!) - a badge of honor for a great community with killer art and an evolving yachtclub-style roadmap. You could hear the ape hoots and screeches down every hallway on Clubhouse.
